info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:58AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue falling through the day. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 am: 8.9 Forecast: Thu 1 pm 9.2 Thu 7 pm 9.1 Fri 1 am 8.9 Fri 7 am 8.7 Fri 1 pm 8.4 Fri 7 pm 8.2 Sat 1 am 8.1 Sat 7 am 8.4 Sat 1 pm 8.9 Sat 7 pm 9.1 Sun 1 am 9.2 &&
